snippet.title: Revelations DLC | Castlevania Lords of Shadow 2
snippet.description:
Get your first look at the new Reveleations DLC for Lords of Shadow 2.

Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 available now for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and PC at http://konami.com/buylos2

Rated MATURE by the ESRB.

Developed by MercurySteam.

Please visit:
http://www.konami-castlevania.com
http://www.facebook.com/lordsofshadow
http://www.twitter.com/konami
http://konami.tumblr.com
http://pinterest.com/konami
